dct_title_s: Map showing Indian reservations within the limits of the United States, 1909
dct_description_sm: Map originally bound in: Annual report of the Department of the Interior.; Insets: Mission index res. in California. [Scale approximately 1:1,600,000] -- Indian pueblo grants in New Mexico. [Scale approximately 1:2,300,000] -- Northeastern Oklahoma [Scale approximately 1:1,600,000].
